Bearer.description:
For token call: \
POST https://{tenant}.b2clogin.com/{tenant}.onmicrosoft.com/{sign_in_flow}/oauth2/v2.0/token \
With header: \
Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded \
With body: \
Scope=https://{tenant}.onmicrosoft.com/midlun/.default \
Client_Id={CLIENT_ID} \
Client_Secret={CLIENT_SECRET} \
Grant_type=client_credentials \
 \
Then input "Bearer {token}" below \
 \
Contact Þjóðskrá for values
Bearer.name: Authorization
